text: Yadi timile asala karma garchau bhane aphnai pha'idako lagi ra yadi duskarma gardachau bhane tinako parinama pani timile nai bhognu parnecha. Ani jaba dosro vacanako (samaya) ayo, (ta arka bhakta pathayaum) taki timra anuhara bigaride'un ra pahilo coti jastai tyasa masjida (baitula mukaddasa) ma pravesa garihalun. Ra junaâ€“juna kuramathi niyantrana garun, toda phoda gari tyasala'i nasta garihalun
